short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Decentraland Browser Extension: Explore Decentraland with Ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily navigate Decentraland Scenes, Worlds, Marketplaces, and other Decentraland resources such as Events, Places, DAO and more all from a single easy-to-use interface. 

The Decentraland Browser Extension automatically remembers recently used inputs such as scene coordinates and WORLD names.

Use the keyword search feature to visit places in Decentraland based on keyword relevance.
